title: Deft in Their Movements (2C99)
text:
Set:	Mines of Moria
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Shire
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Stealth. Regroup: Spot 2 Hobbits to make each site's Shadow number -2 until the end of the turn.
Lore:	“They possessed from the first the art of disappearing swiftly and silently, when large folk who they do not wish to meet come blundering by.”
Rarity:	C
